about_the_game:
brief introduction
Reverse Wind Flip is a text-based adventure game where you will act as a "senior" to provide advice, guidance, and operate a club for three "juniors" who hold the dream of esports. Help them win the championship and fulfill their dreams in the competition.

Gameplay
As a team leader, you need to balance the expenses of the club on a daily basis, strengthen relationships and bonds with the younger generation, and avoid the club from disbanding due to various factors. At the same time, it is necessary to arrange the training time of the "younger generation" reasonably, so that they can enter the finals and win the championship through layers of brutal competition selection. In the competition, you need to command the younger generation's battles reasonably, so that they can win in every battle. Please be careful, even a slight mistake may result in failure. If everything goes smoothly, you and your juniors will become the champions of the competition, putting a perfect end to this journey.
